channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 48 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Stranger Things, City of Shadows, and Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: Investors share what to remember while raising a Series A
item.description: Investors share what founders should remember if looking to raise a Series A.

item.title: FaZe Clan’s future is uncertain after influencers depart
item.description: Six influencers recently announced that they are leaving esports group FaZe Clan following unsuccessful contract negotiations with new management.

item.title: Hyperkin The Competitor Controller Review: A DualSense Copycat
item.description: This copycat controller can’t clone the PS5’s best features, but it’s a solid option for Xbox and PC gamers.

item.title: Meet the team that investigates when journalists and activists get hacked with government spyware
item.description: For years, Access Now’s Digital Security Helpline has been aiding journalists and dissidents who have been targeted with government spyware. This is h...

item.title: Trump administration seeks to deport hate speech researcher previously sued by X
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the U.S. Department of State from arresting or deporting Imran Ahmed, CEO of the Center for Countering Digital...

item.title: The Best After-Christmas Deals on Gear We've Tested (2025)
item.description: Money gifts burning a hole in your pocket? These deals on WIRED-tested gadgets and gizmos will stretch your dollars.

item.title: Tuft & Needle Original Hybrid Mattress Review: A Soft Landing
item.description: Choosing a mattress for your guest room, Airbnb, or VRBO rental is challenging. This hybrid is up for it.

item.title: The 22 top clean tech and energy startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield

item.title: The Environmental and Human Rights Costs of China’s Clean Energy Investments Abroad
